reviewText: Bob Newhart is always good in whatever he's in. He's a classic.
Actually bought the movie for Valerie Landsbug's participation. Even though she's not in it much, I still enjoyed the film.
Fun movie and I'm in it.
This is an old movie. It's good, but not great. I really just recommend it for runners who might want to add it to their running collection.

This was a decent movie of the week when it came out. Sadly whoever listed this doesn't even mention Bob Newhart in the title. It was a bit soapy but running and marathoning gets short shrift normally on tv and the movies. This is worth a look.

this movie was not at all what I thought it would be about. I was hoping for a movie about training and running a marathon, but instead got a sappy movie about a man having a mid life crisis. I did manage to watch the entire movie, but wouldn't reccommend it if you're looking for a "true" marathon movie.
